title: Prohibition of association with more than twenty members.
content: 370. No association, consisting of more than twenty persons shall be formed for the purpose of carrying on any business (other than the business of banking) that has for its object the acquisition of gain by the association, or by the individual members thereof, unless it is registered as a company under this Law, or is formed in pursuance of some other Law, in force for the time being. PART XI. GENERAL Form of registers, etc.
